Another film you might enjoy is "Law Abiding Citizen," where Gerard Butler plays a vigilante seeking justice when the justice system fails him after a tragic event in his life. It's a gripping thriller that explores the lengths one man will go to seek retribution. Enjoy your movie time!

Among the films you've mentioned, I'd like to recommend "The Equalizer" and "United 93".

"The Equalizer", starring Denzel Washington, delves into the complex world of a private detective who fights for justice in a morally ambiguous landscape. It offers an intriguing exploration of righteousness and the means to achieve it.

On the other hand, "United 93" is a gripping portrayal of real events that took place on September 11th, 2001. The movie recounts the tragic story of one of the hijacked planes that crashed in Pennsylvania, shedding light on the heroism and resilience displayed by the passengers during this historical event.
